body: Shit... I need holy water after seeing the tags... For God's sake I thought this was a wholesome one from the cover.

These comments miss the point entirely. A cock is a symbol of sexual power. It lets you be the one doing the fucking, not just the one being fucked. It's the right to take the dominant position. She has this power, and yet she still degrades herself. She doesn't use it. She admits that her girlcock is nothing compared to the thick masculine cocks of real men. She has the sexual power, but still refuses it. To fuck a girl without sexual power is one thing, but to fuck a girl that willingly gives up her sexual power is another entirely. Her useless cock flops and sprays cum as she orgasms. She can't hide the pleasure her body feels, and must spray it everywhere.

Truly, dominating a futanari is the ultimate expression of maledom and she is therefore the perfect expression of a futanari. An amazing manga.
